meanings.definition: A person who exposes or discredits false claims or myths.
meanings.sent1: The debunkers revealed the truth about the fake news.
meanings.sent2: She became known as one of the top debunkers in the field.
meanings.sent3: The debunkers at the conference had a good laugh at the ridiculous conspiracy theories.
meanings.sent4: His sharp eye for detail made him a debunker of urban legends.
meanings.sent5: The debunkers' mission was to shine a light on misinformation and deception.

meanings.definition: The act of exposing or discrediting false claims or myths.
meanings.sent1: Their debunkers of the supernatural made for an interesting TV show.
meanings.sent2: The debunkers of the magic trick explained how it was done.
meanings.sent3: The debunkers of the alien sightings had a field day with the blurry photos.
meanings.sent4: The debunkers of the old legend were like detectives solving a mystery.
meanings.sent5: The debunkers' work was like a shield against misinformation and lies.
